UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.
The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Characterization of a chimeric antimicrobial peptide uncovers evolutionary significance of exon-shuffling.
Literature.Author: Zhu K, Gao B, Zhu S
